message: Hi, I’d like some information on upgrading my current holiday package to include a private transfer.

Hi, welcome to VoyageQuest! My name is Laura, and I’ll be happy to assist you today. Before we begin, let me quickly run through security. Can you kindly confirm your full name, date of birth, and booking reference number, please?  Can you also confirm your email address?
Of course! It’s Peter Johnson, DOB 22nd June 1980, and the reference is VQ67890. My email is customer@customer.com.

Thank you for confirming, Peter. That’s all correct—security is now complete. I completely understand wanting to make your travel experience as smooth as possible. Let me check the options for upgrading your package to include a private transfer. Could you let me know which destination this is for?
This is for my trip to Tenerife next month.
Got it! Let me repeat that back to you: you’d like to add a private transfer to your holiday in Tenerife next month. Does that sound correct?

Perfect. I’ve found an option to add a private transfer to your package for £120 round trip. This includes a dedicated vehicle to and from your hotel, ensuring a stress-free journey. Does this work for you?
Yes, that sounds great. Let’s go ahead and add it.
Thank you, Peter. I’ve updated your booking to include the private transfer, and you will receive a confirmation email shortly. Let me know if there’s anything else I can assist you with today.
No, that’s all. You’ve been really helpful—thank you!
You’re very welcome, Peter. I’m glad I could assist you today. If you need any further help, don’t hesitate to contact us. Have a great day, and take care!
